short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share content to your GNU Social as easily as you do with every other social network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very simple extension that allows the user to post content on his GNU Social account.

Before you use it, be sure to enter you credentials in the "Settings" section:
Site: a full url of your GNU Social platform
Username: your username
Password: your password
